remarks: An alternate representation of a successor aleph.  Compare ~ alephsuc and ~ alephsuc2 .  Equality can be obtained by taking the ` card ` of the right-hand side then using ~ alephcard and ~ carden .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-2004.)
statement:
alephsuc3 $p |- ( A e. On -> ( aleph ` suc A ) ~~ { x e. On | x ~~ ( aleph ` A ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
